patterns: where is my order?
when my order is gonna arrive?
I am hungry
when my order is going to be delivered?
responses:
The expected wait time for your order is :-{eta} {mins}  

The restaurant is preparing your food. A delivery executive has been assigned to deliver your order. He will be reaching the restaurant soon to follow up on your order.

intents.tag: my order has not been picked by the delivery executive yet
patterns: my order has not been picked by the delivery executive yet
my order has not yet been picked up
my order has not been picked up
my order has not been picked up by the delivery executive
my order has not been picked by the delivery person
responses:
Your order was placed at {order_time} {am_pm} 
and the originally expected delivery 
time was {eta} {mins}.

{restaurant_name} has confirmed your 
order and food is being prepared.

Your order should reach you by 
{eta_time} {am_pm}.

Our delivery partner {delivery_exec_name} has arrived at {restaurant_name}

Looks like your order is taking 
longer than expected to be picked 
up - this can happen due to high 
load of orders at the restaurant.

As a next step, Delivery partner 
{delivery_exec_name} is expected to pick 
up your order in the next few minutes and  
will be on the way for delivery.

You can also call Delivery partner 
{delivery_exec_name} at {delivery_exec_contact_number} for 
further assistance.

intents.tag: I want to talk to the delivery executive.
patterns: I want talk to the delivery executive.
I want to contact the delivery executive.
I want to chat with the delivery executive.
I want to call the delivery executive.
I want to call the delivery person.
I want to talk with the delivery person.
I want to call the delivery boy.
I want to chat with the delivery boy.
I want to contact the delivery boy.
responses: You can call the delivery executive {delivery_exec_name} at {delivery_exec_contact_number} to pass on delivery related instructions.

intents.tag: I need to pass on delivery related instructions to the delivery executive.
patterns: I need to pass on delivery related instructions to the delivery executive.
I need to pass on some instructions to the delivery executive.
I need to pass on some instructions to the delivery boy.
I need to pass on some instructions to the delivery person.
I need to give some instructions to the delivery person.
responses: You can call the delivery executive {delivery_exec_name} at {delivery_exec_contact_number}

intents.tag: I want to pass on food preparation related instructions to the restaurant.
patterns: I want to pass on food preparation related instructions to the restaurant.
I want to pass on some instructions to the restaurant.
I want to pass on some instructions to the hotel.
I want to give some instructions to the restaurant.
I want to give some instructions to the hotel.
I want to give some food preparation related instructions to the hotel.
I want to give some food preparation related instructions to the restaurant.
responses:
You can call the restaurant {restaurant_name} at {restaurant_contact_number} to pass on food preparation related instructions.
 
Please mention the swiggy order id #{order_id} when passing on the instructions.

intents.tag: I want to contact the restaurant.
patterns: I want to contact the restaurant.
I want to call the restaurant.
I want to call the hotel.
I want make a call the hotel.
I want make a call the restaurant.
responses: You can call the restaurant {restaurant_name} at {restaurant_contact_number}

patterns: Hi
How are you
Is anyone there?
Hello
Good day
Whats up
responses: Hi there, how can I help?

See you later
